actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: A bill to amend the Service Contract Act to prohibit discrimination against employees of predecessor employers under such Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Service Contract Act of 1965 to require the successor government service contractor to give the predecessor contractor's employees the right of first refusal for employment in order of seniority.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Service Contract Act to prohibit discrimination against employees of predecessor employers under such Act, and for other purposes.
